signal_types.description: Balance sheet equation fails: Assets != Equity + Liabilities beyond tolerance.
Equity roll-forward fails: Opening + Profit - Dividends +/- Other != Closing.
Dividend reported but distributable reserves appear structurally impossible.
Profit and balance movements diverge without plausible bridge.
Cash flow does not reconcile with balance sheet cash movement.
Write-down conflicts with other financial lines.
Intercompany balances move without contextual explanation.
Large credit-like event without traceable debit counterpart.
Statement line requires note disclosure but notes are absent.
Mapping from report line to model has low confidence.
